products.title: Splash Taupe
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Taupe Perfect Fit Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 330mm Max Width: 1400mm
 	Min Drop: 165mm Max Drop: 1800mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
